Address.value: 700 CENTRAL AVENUE SUITE 100, SAINT PETERSBURG, Florida, 33701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BayFirst Financial Corp is a one-bank holding company, it generates its revenue from interest on loans and gain-on-sale income derived from the sale of loans into the secondary market. The company serves a broad spectrum of individuals, families, and small businesses, supported by national business lines in residential and SBA lending and technology platforms. The source of funding for loans is deposits. It has two reportable segments: Banking and Residential Mortgage Lending. The majority of its revenue is derived from the Banking segment. BayFirst measures performance through net interest income after provision for loan losses, return on average assets, and return on average common equity, while maintaining appropriate regulatory leverage and risk-based capital ratios.

value.name: Robin L. Oliver
